popularityCurve.label: matthew yglesias makes it clear that the path to redemption is open if not always pothole-free americans no longer support reckless republican policies and the time is ripe-not for a new direction but for the return of a tried-and-true direction with heads in the sand he provides a starting point for politicians policymakers pundits and citizens alike to return america to its role as leader of a peace-loving and cooperative international community
